turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you order me a four large pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three veggie lovers and one Hawaiian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you want 4 large pizzas, 3 veggie lovers and 1 hawaiin, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and I want extra cheese on four of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but that's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say you will be picking up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Speak up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
